query: SELECT 'SENT' as type, sentAt as exact_timestamp, messageType as content FROM reminderLogs WHERE recipient = '+447950586880' UNION ALL SELECT 'RECEIVED' as type, receivedAt as exact_timestamp, LEFT(messageBody, 50) as content FROM customerMessages WHERE fromNumber = '+447950586880' ORDER BY exact_timestamp DESC
